author: Special Correspondent
text: Owing to line block between 2 a.m. and 5 a.m. to facilitate engineering and maintenance work between Ennore and Minjur railway stations, the following EMUs have been cancelled till March 31 — trains 42001 leaving Moore Market Complex (MMC) for Gummidipoondi at 12.15 a.m. and train (no. 42002) running in the return direction leaving Gummidipoondi at 2.45 a.m.
title: Change in EMU service
